scripts.build-system-uri: cd system_uri && cargo build --release && cd ../ && cp -f system_uri/target/release/*system_uri* ./src/native
scripts.build-release: npm run build-system-uri && cd native/safe_app && cargo build --release && cd ../../ && cp -f native/target/release/*safe_app* ./src/native
scripts.pretest: npm run build-system-uri && cd native/safe_app && cargo build --features "use-mock-routing" && cd ../../ && cp -f native/target/debug/*safe_app* ./src/native
